query: Where does AWS D1.1:2025 specify the attenuation factor methodology for ultrasonic testing?
expected_answer: Clause 8.18 — attenuation compensation and reference block calibration procedures
rationale: Clause 8.18 in D1.1:2025 provides detailed attenuation factor methodology for UT, including reference block calibration procedures, distance-amplitude correction (DAC) curve construction, and material-specific attenuation coefficients. This ensures consistent sensitivity across varying material conditions and inspector technique.

citations.excerpt: Ultrasonic testing — attenuation factor and DAC curve procedures
